recommendations: Chitra Koshta “Thanks Ma'am, It was great working with you. So much to learn from you. You are really a good mentor in terms of professional related and personal advices. I have learnt a lot from you how to manage time and ,segregate the things to complete work on time.”

Johnson George “Nidhi Kansal is a detail-oriented Manager/Writer and Professional who supervised every aspect without losing sight of the strategic objectives of the agenda at hand. She prefers to understand something in-depth carefully without first rendering an opinion. Qualities you will find in Belinda readily: - Adapts to change quickly - Communicates very clearly - Creative, original - Gets others to believe in an Idea - Admits mistakes - Relies on gut for decisions - Relies on data for decisions - Reliable, follows-through - Breaks rules to get stuff done - Friendly, likable - Natural leader - Bold, decisive - Organized, scheduled - Detail-oriented She has a fantastic Attitude during work, - Hard worker - Sharpening skillset - Discipline - Listening to others - Reliability - Very Focused - Great Social skills - She definitely Lead by example - She always get the points across and her listeners love her”…………………………. ”

          PRAGYATA FOUNDATION - Non Profit OrganisationRegistered under Indian Trust Act, 1882 vide registration No.-18387 TRUSTEES⇒ Mamta Yadav : Chairperson                    ⇒ Ajeet Yadav: President                      ⇒ Kamla: Vice President                                  ⇒ Madan Gopal: Secretory                           ⇒ Ankit Sharma: Jt. Secretory            ⇒ Deepak Yadav: Treasurer⇒ Nidhi Kansal: Member                              ⇒ Yamini Joshi: MemberThe true motive behind the establishment of Pragyata Foundation was due to a huge driving force behind the founders. Retired Navy Officer, Late Shri Ramnath Yadav, a true visionary was a very kind-hearted person who served others before himself. He spent his entire life in serving to the Nation and his vision to see a developed India became a question when he passed away in November 2014. Looking at this, the founders pledged to carry his vision forward with full spirits so that they can fulfil his dreams in his absence as well. This finally led to the formation of the Pragyata Foundation which is now one of the most hardworking organisations for a great social cause.Pragyata Foundation is a registered Non-Profit Organisation which has been conducting activities for the security of human rights, promotion and protection of child rights, women empowerment, education, health and welfare programs, awareness workshops and the MDG's with complete determination.Established in October 2015, the foundation has events being organised keeping various aspects in mind.In fact some projects on a personal level started even before the establishment of the foundation on small scales which have been continued successfully since June, 2015. Soon after, now we have the opportunity to formally take our plans ahead with full support and guidance of other organisations.I have done lot of project with this ngo in various field and have actively participated on work shops and other orientation program.
